Pre-Game Insights: Rainy Florida awaits confident USA and demoralised Ireland
USA will qualify for the Super Eight at Ireland and Pakistan's expense if the game is washed out
Ireland need to win both their remaining games by considerable margins to qualify
Monank Patel missed Thursday's match against India due to a shoulder niggle
Paul Stirling has endured a lean run lately, dismissed for 2 and 9 in Ireland's first two games
Miscellaneous Highlights: A flash-flood emergency is likely to wash out the game
Florida is in the midst of a tropical disturbance that has brought intense rainfall
A state of emergency has been declared in five counties, including Broward where the stadium is located
Others: USA possible XI: 1 Monank Patel (capt & wk), 2 Steven Taylor, 3 Andries Gous, 4 Aaron Jones, 5 Nitish Kumar, 6 Corey Anderson, 7 Harmeet Singh, 8 Jasdeep Singh, 9 Saurabh Netravalkar, 10 Ali Khan, 11 Nosthush Kenjige/Shadley van Schalkwyk.

Ireland possible XI: 1 Paul Stirling (capt), 2 Andrew Balbirnie, 3 Lorcan Tucker (wk), 4 Harry Tector, 5 Curtis Campher, 6 George Dockrell, 7 Gareth Delany, 8 Mark Adair, 9 Barry McCarthy, 10 Josh Little, 11 Craig Young.
